ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ccase.1 | |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ta ) |
| 2 |  | ccase.2 | |- ( ( ch /\ ps ) -> ta ) |
| 3 |  | ccase.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ th ) -> ta ) |
| 4 |  | ccase.4 | |- ( ( ch /\ th ) -> ta ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_jaoian | |- ( ( ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ps ) -> ta ) |
| 6 | 3, 4 | #P_jaoian | |- ( ( ( ph \/ ch ) /\ th ) -> ta ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_jaodan | |- ( ( ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ( ps \/ th ) ) -> ta ) |
